revised_title: Anatomy and Morphology of Air-Bladder and Weberian Ossicles in Siluroid Fishes
tldr: The authors investigate the morphology of the air-bladder and Weberian ossicles, as well as the associated skeletal modifications in 100 species of Siluroid fishes, belonging to 51 genera. Their study aims to provide a detailed understanding of these structures and their physiological significance, contributing to the knowledge of fish anatomy and evolution.
